name: Sandy Builds
description:
You wake up stranded in a desolate desert surrounded by nothing but palms, cacti and sand - lots of sand. Armed with the knowledge of building machines your goal is to get out of there by crafting all sorts of handy materials!

A huge variety of machines and all sorts of conveyors need to be constructed with a plan in mind. Start small and grow until you have all the required materials!

Discover all mysteries hidden within this harsh environment as you were not the first one to be stranded here!

Automate and Coordinate the crafting of every available material within the desert. The only thing limiting your construction abilities is you and your plans!

  • Movement, Placement and Interaction done with the mouse
  • Keyboard aids by providing shortcuts to nearly all buttons
  • Display shortcuts with 'Left Alt'
